title: Getting Started
text: Perform enrichment analysis using enrichR. Allows analysis multiple conditions Analyze - -regulated genes separately. Filter terms p-value gene thresholds. Calculates similarities results terms based included genes Clusters terms using random walk algorithm Generates prompt LLM summarized cluster annotations Allows easy heatmap visualization

text: results can plotted Bubbleplot. enrichment done -downregulation seperatly, plot split -downregulated genes. plot colors can adjusted, using plot_colors arguement:  Additionally, results can plotted Heatmap. enrichment done -downregulation seperatly, Heatmap splitted -downregulated genes. heatmap can customized setting cluster_rows/columns TRUE. colors can also changed plot_colors argument.  can add annotation_bar, shows number terms, contained cluster.
